TopicTitle: Is Squad paying their contractors living wages now?

Articles.Content:
I mean no disrespect in this thread so please note I'm asking kindly.

I cannot in good conscious buy the expansion if they're still taking advantage of people.  I love this game dearly but I have not been able to play since I found out how the executives were managing this aspect of the franchise.  I'd rather pay more and know those who do the work can actually support their families.  I'm not sure there's a way to communicate this, but maybe a manager could stop in and say, "yes that was wrong in the past and we're made changes going forward".

 

Thank you.

 

Edited March 23, 2017 by jpinard
Whatever the arrangement between SQUAD and its employees/contractors is, it is between SQUAD and their employees/contractors and is of no business to anyone else.
